definition: to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect

sentences.english: Gentlemen, my father always detested me because I could not understand mathematics.

我老爸嫌弃我，现在泰勒也丢下了我。

sentences.english: GuanYa lili is a should be under, but also asked whether Luan school abandon themselves.
